required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Testing of Collagen and Zhuyin Drinks
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy Testing of Collagen and Zhuyin Drinks

brief_summary.textblock: To assess collagen and zhuyin drink on skin & body condition improvement

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin moisture at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Corneometer速 CM825 was utilized to measure skin moisture. Units: arbitrary Corneometer速 units 0-120

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin wrinkles at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure wrinkles. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.measure: The change of skin collagen density
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin collagen density at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: DermaLab速 USB - 20 MHz High Freq. Ultrasound probe was utilized to scan and analyze skin collagen density. Units:Intensity score

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline TEWL at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Tewameter速 TM 300 was utilized to measure TEWL. Units: g/h/m2

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Glossymeter GL 200 was utilized to measure skin brightness. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of interleukin-6.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of interleukin-8.

primary_outcome.measure: The change of Tumor necrosis factor
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of Tumor necrosis factor.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of Matrix metalloproteinase-1 .

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin brightness at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of metallopeptidase inhibitor 1.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin texture at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin texture. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin pores at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin pores. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline skin spots at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin spots. Units: arbitrary units

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline red areas at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure red areas. Units: arbitrary units

intervention.description: consume 1 bottle (50 mL) per day for 28 days
consume 1 bottle (50 mL) per day for 28 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy adults aged above 20 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject who is not willing to participate in this study.
- Patients with diseases of the skin, heart, liver, kidney, endocrine and other organs and patients with mental illness (according to medical history).
- Subjects who have known cosmetic, drug or food allergies, difficulty in digestive tract absorption or disorder.
- Female who is pregnant or nursing or planning to become pregnant during the course of the study.
- Received facial laser therapy, chemical peeling or UV overexposure in the past 4 weeks.
- Vegetarian
- Subjects who have large spots (area >3 square centimeter) or abnormal acne.
